item.description:
I am really impressed with this band and the way they combine a bunch of different music styles.  (I think founder Edward Leonard refers to his music as "FRAZ" - Funk, Rock, Acoustic, and Jazz...or something like that) ...you can check them out pretty thoroughly on their website and sample/buy their new CD and independisc.  This is the CD release party and should be a great time.  Cafe Nine is a laid back bar atmosphere.  If you feel the urge to groove on a Thursday night, come join us!

http://www.ageofreasonmusic.com/index.html

http://www.independisc.com/ageofreason.htm
item.name: Age of Reason CD release party at Cafe Nine
